## Create a plot

# Require libraries

```{r}
#|label: libraries
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
#| label: import data
#get palmerpenguins data
data <- palmerpenguins::penguins
```

```{r}
#| label: subset sample
dream <- data %>%
  filter(
        island == "Dream"
      )
```

```{r}
#| label: figure
#| fig-cap: weight of penguins by sex whatever
#| fig-height: 5.2


ggplot(dream, aes(x = sex, y = body_mass_g, fill = species)) +
  geom_jitter(aes(color = species)) +
  labs(x = "sex", y = "body mass (g)")
```
